TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MustUnderstandBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

Docs.summary: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`. Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool validate) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of headers.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.

Docs.param: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The binding parameters for the behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime behavior) cil managed

Docs.param: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
Docs.summary: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.

Docs.param: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
Docs.summary: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
Docs.value: if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
